questions.sentence:
Complete the program where Surveyor stores Earth coordinates using pointers and prints out the direction to point towards Earth.
		int main()
		double earthLatitude, earthLongitude
		double ptrLatitude, ptrLongitude
	 
		ptrLatitude = [       ]
		ptrLongitude = earthLongitude

	ptrLatitude = 34°
		ptrLongitude = 180°

	PRINT(Earth Coordinates:)
		PRINT(Latitude:,ptrLatitude)
		PRINT(Longitude:,[       ])
	PRINT(Direction to point towards Earth: Straight ahead)

	return 0
